segments.pli: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgatā bhikkhunī yathābhataṃ nikkhittā evaṃ niraye.
segments.en: “Mendicants, a nun with five qualities is cast down to hell.
Without examining or scrutinizing, she praises those deserving of criticism,
and criticizes those deserving of praise.

segments.pli: ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā appasādanīye ṭhāne pasādaṃ upadaṃseti,
segments.en: She arouses faith in things that are dubious,

segments.pli: ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā pasādanīye ṭhāne appasādaṃ upadaṃseti,
segments.en: and doesn’t arouse faith in things that are inspiring.
And she wastes gifts given in faith.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgatā bhikkhunī yathābhataṃ nikkhittā evaṃ niraye.
segments.en: A nun with these five qualities is cast down to hell.

segments.pli: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgatā bhikkhunī yathābhataṃ nikkhittā evaṃ sagge.
segments.en: A nun with five qualities is raised up to heaven.
After examining and scrutinizing, she criticizes those deserving of criticism,
and praises those deserving of praise.

segments.pli: anuvicca pariyogāhetvā appasādanīye ṭhāne appasādaṃ upadaṃseti,
segments.en: She doesn’t arouse faith in things that are dubious,

segments.pli: anuvicca pariyogāhetvā pasādanīye ṭhāne pasādaṃ upadaṃseti,
segments.en: and does arouse faith in things that are inspiring.
And she doesn’t waste gifts given in faith.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgatā bhikkhunī yathābhataṃ nikkhittā evaṃ sagge”ti.
segments.en: A nun with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
